channel.title: CVE Feed for Jenkins Project -- Jenkins GitHub Pull Request Coverage Status Plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Jenkins Project -- Jenkins GitHub Pull Request Coverage Status Plugin

item.title: CVE-2023-24442|2023-10-24T12:48:33.064Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20github%20pull%20request%20coverage%20status%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins GitHub Pull Request Coverage Status Plugin 2.2.0 and earlier stores the GitHub Personal Access Token, Sonar access token and Sonar password unencrypted in its global configuration file on the Jenkins controller where they can be viewed by users with access to the Jenkins controller file system.
